thread.title: How T-Mobile Raised the Bar on AED Safety | EHS Today
thread.title_full: How T-Mobile Raised the Bar on AED Safety | EHS Today

title: How T-Mobile Raised the Bar on AED Safety | EHS Today
text: October 22, 2024 2:00 PM ET / 1:00 PM CT / 11:00 AM PT / 7:00 PM GMT Duration: 1 hour Sponsor: RescueStat Already registered? [Click here](https://event.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1690353&tp_key=4c251ac545) to log in. Summary Join us for an exclusive case study featuring Yasmin Armstrong, Senior Environmental Health and Safety (EHS) Program Manager at T-Mobile. Yasmin will share how T-Mobile enhanced employee safety by implementing virtual CPR training during COVID-19 and deploying a cutting-edge AED monitoring system across 240+ devices. This session offers practical insights into how one of the nation's leading companies keeps their workforce safe through innovation and strategic EHS program management. Safety professionals won't want to miss this firsthand account of T-Mobile’s proactive approach to emergency preparedness. Key takeaways include: - Learn how T-Mobile transitioned to virtual CPR training during the COVID-19 pandemic - Discover how T-Mobile manages and monitors AEDs across 240+ devices nationwide - Gain insights into how EHS leaders can integrate safety technologies for greater efficiency - Understand T-Mobile's approach to enhancing emergency readiness - Hear from an experienced EHS professional about the challenges and successes of implementing a comprehensive safety program Speakers Yasmin Armstrong | Senior National Program Manager – Environmental Health & Safety | T-Mobile Yasmin Armstrong is a Senior Environmental Health and Safety (EHS) Program Manager at T-Mobile with over 14 years of experience. She oversees emergency planning, pandemic response, ergonomics, and OSHA compliance. Yasmin collaborates across teams to enhance safety programs, reduce injuries, and ensure compliance with safety standards, while also managing key projects like the Emergency Notification Systems Program. Jake Parker | Senior Director of Sales | RescueStat Jake Parker is the Senior Director of Sales at RescueStat, where he has led since April 2023. With extensive experience in sales leadership, he previously held key roles at ReliaQuest, DecisionLink, and Podium, where he consistently exceeded sales quotas and built high-performing teams. Jake holds a BBA from Western Governors University and has a background in business administration and finance from Brigham Young University-Idaho. His expertise lies in strategic account management, sales development, and driving revenue growth. Sponsored by
